title: 106｜理论盘点：人脸识别常用的 Python 库有哪些？
content:
课后习题
请你打开任意一张图片，并使用 cv.rectangle() 函数对图像进行标注，标注范围分别为 50,50,50,50 100,100,100,100 标注后保存图片，并查看标注后的图片。

课程代码、课件及其他相关资料地址
https://gitee.com/wilsonyin/zero-basics-python

comments.comment_content:
import cv2

#读取图片
pic = cv2.imread('girl.png')

#给图片打标
cv2.rectangle(pic, (50, 50), (100, 100), color=(0, 0, 255), thickness=2)
cv2.imshow('girl', pic)
cv2.waitKey(0)

cv2.imwrite('new_g.png', pic)

cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2

pic = cv2.imread('./123.jpg')
cv2.rectangle(pic, (50,50), (100,100), color=(0,0,255), thickness=2)
cv2.imshow('title', pic)
cv2.waitKey(0) # 等待，按任意键继续下一步操作
cv2.imwrite('./333.png', pic)
print(pic)

import cv2

pic = cv2.imread("第14章/cat.png")

cv2.rectangle(pic, (50,50),(50,50),color=(0,0,255),thickness=2)
cv2.rectangle(pic, (100,100),(100,100),color=(0,0,255),thickness=2)

cv2.imwrite("第14章/cat2.png", pic)

cv2.imshow("title", pic)

cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2 as cv

pic = cv.imread('./1.jpg')
cv.rectangle(pic, (50,50),(50,50),color=(0,0,255),thickness=2)
cv.rectangle(pic, (100,100),(100,100),color=(0,0,255),thickness=2)
cv.imwrite('./2.jpg', pic)
cv.imshow('title', pic)
cv.waitKey(0)
cv.destroyAllWindows()
